title: Cannabis 101: A beginner-friendly guide
excerpt: New to shopping? Start here for simple terms, formats, and how to pick a good first product.
content:
## Cannabis 101

This beginner guide covers the basics: formats, labels, and how to shop with confidence.

### Quick tips
- Start low and go slow
- Prefer clear labeling
- Choose a format that matches your timeline

title: How terpenes shape aroma and experience
excerpt: Terpenes are aromatic compounds that help explain why strains smell different—and why they can feel different, too.
content:
## Terpenes 101

Terpenes are aromatic compounds found in many plants. In cannabis, they contribute to smell and flavor.

### What to look for
- Aroma you enjoy
- Consistent terpene profiles
- Product freshness

title: Choosing a format: flower vs vapes vs edibles
excerpt: Pick a format based on timing, convenience, and your comfort level—not hype.
content:
## Choosing a format

Different formats have different timelines. This guide helps you match format to your plan.

### Fast vs slow
- Inhaled formats tend to feel faster
- Edibles tend to take longer and last longer

title: Relaxation: building a simple shopping shortlist
excerpt: A non-medical, educational approach to picking options people often explore for unwinding.
content:
## Relaxation shopping shortlist

People often shop for relaxation by looking at aroma, terpene profile, and format timing.

### Try this approach
- Choose a calming aroma
- Prefer a predictable format
- Keep dosage consistent

title: Focus-friendly shopping: what to look for
excerpt: Many shoppers aim for a clear-headed experience—here are common ways they filter options.
content:
## Focus-friendly shopping

This article is educational only. Consider aroma, terpene profile, and timing when building a shortlist.

title: New Jersey cannabis shopping basics (2026)

content:
## NJ cannabis shopping basics

Bring a valid ID, plan your visit, and ask questions. This is a general educational overview.
